mapper.select: /* tutorApply.selectTutorApplyList */ SELECT D.TUTOR_NAME , D.INTRO AS TUTOR_INTRO , C.MACH_LV_ID , C.MACH_LV_NAME , A.TUTORING_TITLE , A.TUTORING_TUTEE_ID , B.APPLY_ID , E.REG_NAME , G.INTEREST_CAT , H.LEVEL_NAME , J.WEEDAY_END , J.AM_PM FROM TUTORING_TUTEE A , TUTOR_APPLY B , MACH_LV C , TUTOR_INFO D , REGION E , TUTEE_NEEDTHCH F , INTEREST G , TECH_LEVEL H , TUTORING_TUTEE_TIME I , TIME_DIVISION J WHERE 1=1 AND A.TUTORING_TUTEE_ID = B.TUTORING_TUTEE_ID AND B.MACH_LV_ID = C.MACH_LV_ID AND B.TUTOR_ID = D.TUTOR_ID AND A.REG_ID = E.REG_ID AND A.TUTORING_TUTEE_ID = F.TUTORING_TUTEE_ID AND F.INTEREST_ID = G.INTEREST_ID AND F.LEVEL_ID = H.LEVEL_ID AND A.TUTORING_TUTEE_ID = I.TUTORING_TUTEE_ID AND I.TIME_CAT_ID = J.TIME_CAT_ID AND B.TUTOR_ID = 12

/* tutorApply.selectTutorApplyBoard */ SELECT A.APPLY_ID , A.WRITER , A.CONTENT , TO_CHAR( A.WRITEDATE, 'AM HH12:MI MM-DD') AS WRITEDATE , CASE WHEN A.READCHECK = 0 THEN '읽음' ELSE '1' END AS READCHECK , CASE WHEN WRITER = #{TUTOR_NAME} THEN 'RIGHT' ELSE 'LEFT' END AS TEXT_ALIGN , B.MACH_LV_ID FROM APPLY_BOARD A , TUTOR_APPLY B WHERE 1=1 AND A.APPLY_ID = B.APPLY_ID(+) AND A.APPLY_ID = 12 ORDER BY A.WRITEDATE, A.APPLY_BD_ID
mapper.insert: /* tutorInvited.insertTutorApplyBoardMsg */ INSERT INTO APPLY_BOARD (APPLY_BD_ID , APPLY_ID , WRITER , CONTENT , WRITEDATE , READCHECK) VALUES (APPLY_BOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL , #{APPLY_ID} , #{TUTOR_NAME} , #{TUTOR_MSG} , SYSDATE , '1')
